participant_1.background:
I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure.
i want to own a house on a beach.
i adopted all my dogs.
I like to listen to oldies while enjoying my ice cream.
i enjoy sleeping in on my days off.

participant_2.background:
My drum set is my most valued material possession because it is a reminder of my time in Japan and the adventures I had there.
I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
I remember summers spent playing in the creek with my friends.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play the drums, collect comic books, and spend time with my family.
What's your favorite thing about your drum set?
It's a reminder of my time in Japan, where I met a group of amazing people who shared my passion for adventure.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
It's a beautiful country with a rich culture. I'm glad I got to experience it.
I'm sure you have a lot of great memories from your time there.
I do! I miss my friends and the adventures we had together.
Maybe you'll get to go back someday.
I hope so!
What are your favorite comic books?
I like a lot of different kinds of comics, but I'm a big fan of Batman and Superman.
Me too! I'm a big fan of Marvel comics.
I like some Marvel comics too, but I'm more of a DC fan.
I like both DC and Marvel.
I'm glad we can agree on something!
What do you like to do with your family?
We like to go camping, fishing, and play games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go camping too.
It's a great way to spend time with your family and enjoy the outdoors.
I agree
